reviews.text: Stayed here over a weekend with my wife who was attending a conference.
reviews.title: Good Breakfast, Good Stay

reviews.text: The breakfast was great with two hot items and a wide selection of bagels, muffins and toast. Hot coffee, tea and juice which was kept open all day. For me, free food and drinks go a long way to improving any hotel. It is an amenity that is actually used.
reviews.title: very pleased

likes.liked: — Rooms were quiet despite the hotel being full.

reviews.text: The beds were comfortable with duvets and a choice of pillows. Room was a bit cramped, but serviceable.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel by anyone's standards!

reviews.text: Free high-speed internet was reliable and no hassle. Like the food, free internet is a strong positive in a hotel.
reviews.title: Excellent Alternative

reviews.text: Very pleased with overall experience at this hotel. It was a bit pricey, and unfortunately there was little to compare it to, so we were quite willing to pay the extra.
reviews.title: Would stay here again!

reviews.text: This is definitely one of the best hamptons I've stayed at - very clean, friendly staff, and well-appointed rooms. I've stayed at probably 20-30 different hamptons all across the US and Canada - and I can say this is very good!
reviews.title: One of the best hamptons I've stayed at!

reviews.text: We were in town for a funeral last week. The entire staff was aware of why we were there. The wonderful staff was awesome from the moment we called for a reservation. We needed two beds but they only had kings available but said they would make a note. Upon arrival late in the evening we were given a room with two beds! The rooms are nice and clean. The decor is a bit above what you would expect. There is a nice large work desk and the bathroom is spacious and modern. Very new hotel, just opened in August of 2005.
reviews.title: WOnderful!!
